THESE TORRENTS ARE REAL .....LET ME GURANTEE YOU THIS..........AND I SEED FOR ALMOST 18 HOURS A DAY...............AND FOR ABOUT SIX HOURS A DAY I HAVE TO GO OFFLINE...............

SO PATIENCE IS REQUESTED ON BEHALF OF DOWNLOADERS.........BECAUSE THE SIZE OF THE FILE IS TOO LARGE.........

how do I upload multiple movies like you have done here?....I just started uploading videos recently and I've only figured out how to do one at a time and I have hundreds of movies and music videos I'm wanting to share

@KYLER274

SIMPLY CUT AND PASTE ALL THE MULTIPLE MOVIES IN ONE FOLDER...........

THEN CREATE THE TORRENT OF THE FOLDER THAT YOU PUT MOVIES INTO...............

THEN UPLOAD THE TORRENT TO THE SITES LIKE THE PIRATE BAY.....ETC.ETC....

DON'T FORGET TO PUT REFERENCES OF MULTIPLE TRACKERS WHILE CREATING TORRENT FILE...................................

I REQUEST ALL THE DOWNLOADERS TO PLEASE INCREASE THE UPLOAD SPEEDS............AND PLEASE SEED FOR A BRIEF TIME AFTER DOWNLOADING.................

BECAUSE...............

SEEDING IS CARING..........
